scripts.server-watch: pm2 delete cra-sails-watch; pm2 start ./ecosystem.config.yml --only cra-sails-watch
scripts.start: npm run server-watch & (tidil check-server --port-env DEV_SERVER_PORT && tidil open --port-env DEV_SERVER_PORT && pm2 logs)
scripts.prod: NODE_ENV=production next build && NODE_ENV=production node server/app.js
scripts.server-test: pm2 delete cra-sails-test; pm2 start ./ecosystem.config.yml --only cra-sails-test && tidil check-server --port-env TEST_SERVER_PORT
scripts.test: npm run server-test && NODE_ENV=test node ./node_modules/jest --no-cache ; pm2 delete cra-sails-test
scripts.lint: node ./node_modules/eslint . --quiet --report-unused-disable-directives && echo 'âœ”  Your .js files look good.'
scripts.docker:reset: docker stop $(docker ps -a -q) && docker rm $(docker ps -a -q)
scripts.docker:start: npm run docker:rmi ; npm run docker:stop ; docker build -t cra-sails . && npm run docker:run
scripts.docker:mysql: docker stop local-mysql-server ; docker rm local-mysql-server ; docker run --name local-mysql-server -p 3306:3306 -e MYSQL_ALLOW_EMPTY_PASSWORD=true -e MYSQL_DATABASE=cra-sails-local -e MYSQL_ROOT_HOST=% -d mysql/mysql-server:5.7 --character-set-server=utf8mb4 --collation-server=utf8mb4_unicode_ci
